page.title: 17<<<<<< A34 Trunk Road >>>>>>
page.content: <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Traffic on the A.34 dual carriageway has increased by 1000% since 1927. Increases in traffic have meant more crashes. Mrs. Hodsdon, a local garage owner, has known 9 deaths and 20 serious injuries since the Chilton by-pass opened in 1978.The end of the dual carriageway and change to single lane at Gore Hill is the main cause of accidents. In 1985, work commenced on extending the dual carriageway over Gore Hill. Mrs.Hodsdon feels that this will make the road safer and improve the entrance and exit to her garage. A34 traffic is heavy.In one and a quarter hours 2,298 vehicles were counted passing under the Jubillee Bridge, that is one vehicle every 2 seconds. <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
